name: qlax2i
body: |- wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c1, chj, c0))

|- wceq(co(c0, chj, c1), co(c1, chj, c0))

comment: One of the equations showing ` CH ` is an ortholattice. (This corresponds to axiom "ax-2" in the Quantum Logic Explorer.) (Contributed by NM, 4-Aug-2004.) (New usage is discouraged.)
